title: Alan Watts The Book Audio(.wav and .mp3)/PDF
description:
Alan W. Watts


THE BOOK (1966)
On the Taboo 
Against Knowing Who You Are

A BRILLIANT SYNTHESIS OF IDEAS 
THAT USES EASTERN PHILOSOPHY AS THE KEY 
TO HELP US MAKE SENCE OF THE WAY 
WE LIVE OUR LIVES

Narrator: Ralph Blum

90:Min

Files:

Each chapter has two audio files. One is a .wav and the other an .mp3. I am an audio engineer and like high quality recordings. I included the wavs for that reason. It's worth the time trust me. I have also included an e-book copy of "The Book" as well.

1. Inside Information 
2. The Game Of Black-and-White
3. How To Be A Genuine Fake
4. The World Is Your Body
5. So What?
6. IT


Description:

What can I say that will give this material justice? I can't even begin to appraise the value of The Book. All I ask is that you read and listen openly. Without prejudice and without any preconceptions.
